item.title: Chinese Immigrants Create 21 Children Via Surrogate Before Allegedly Abusing Them
item.description: While investigating allegations of abuse, police discovered 15 children under the age of three in the Chinese couple's L.A. mansion.

item.title: No, Trump Hasn’t Gone Soft On Silicon Valley Monopolies
item.description: President Trump’s antitrust team isn’t pro-monopolies. It's pro-consumer, pro-competition, and pro-America.

item.title: Leftists’ Victimhood And Narcissism Are Two Self-Obsessed Sides Of The Same Coin
item.description: If you think you're a victim, even when things are going well for you, then you're obviously spending too much time thinking about yourself.

item.title: Little Beasts Exhibit Examines The Nexus Of Biology, Theology, And Art
item.description: Little Beasts gives viewers a chance to take a step back, appreciate the beauty of nature, and contemplate mankind’s place in the universe.

item.title: Filing: Smartmatic Gave Unlawful Gifts To LA Official Who Helped Obtain Voting Firm’s ‘Lucrative Contract’
